messages.title: Vote Liberal Democrat
messages.content: Send them a message they can't ignore

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Change the direction of our country

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour and the Tories are fighting for the hardest possible Brexit

issues.brexitEurope: Labour and Tories have sided with UKIP on Brexit. I am a passionate and unapologetic European, after the Referendum I decided I could not stand by as friends, family and neighbours from the EU were let down by Labour and the Tories.
issues.economy: Fighting to protect our friends, neighbours, loved ones and public services from the damage it will cause.
issues.government: Believes the country is on the wrong path and it deserves better.

community.content: I live in Chapel Allerton with my partner and children. Labour and the Tories have sided with UKIP on Brexit. They have let you down - Vote for Change.

leaflet.personalStatement: My name is Jon Hannah and I am seeking to earn your vote on 8th June. I live in Chapel Allerton with my partner and our children, you may well have seen me in the community. I left my job as a senior manager in the NHS last year deflated at the damage being done by the Tory Government. I am a passionate and unapologetic European, after the Referendum I decided I could not stand by as friends, family and neighbours from the EU were let down by Labour and the Tories. I believe the country is on the wrong path and it deserves better.

politicalExperience.achievements: Resigned due to dissatisfaction with the damage done by the Tory Government

endorsements.endorsement: "Remoaner of the Year" and Leader of the Liberal Democrats

images.caption: If this lot don't speak for you on Brexit...

examples: I believe the country is on the wrong path and it deserves better.
Labour and the Tories have sided with UKIP on Brexit. They have let you down - Vote for Change.
I am a passionate and unapologetic European.
When we were upset, they called us 'Snowflakes'. When we cried out, they called us 'Remoaners'. When we fought, they called us 'Saboteurs'. But this time, we're Voters.
I live in Chapel Allerton with my partner and our children, you may well have seen me in the community.
I am a passionate and unapologetic European, after the Referendum I decided I could not stand by as friends, family and neighbours from the EU were let down by Labour and the Tories.
Fighting to protect our friends, neighbours, loved ones and public services from the damage it will cause.
